76928.現在 調理職人レベル<%dL_SYOKUNIN_LV>です。\n何を作りますか？:
Your current Cooking level is <%dL_SYOKUNIN_LV>.
What do you want to cook?<break>

76930.<%sL_STORAGE_NAME>が いっぱいなので\n調理が できません。<:
<%sL_STORAGE_NAME> is full, so I can't
cook...<end>

76932.一度 コツをつかんだレシピは\n『いっぱつしあげ』が できるようになります。\n:
Once you have a knack for a recipe, the "Quick Craft" command becomes available.
Quick Craft allows you to finish the item in no time flat! However, items created this way can never be ★★★ quality.
In addition, the chance of getting a critical hit while using "Craft Normally" has increased slightly!

76933.<%sL_RECIPE>のレシピは\nまだ 覚えていません。<end>:
You don't know the <%sL_RECIPE>
recipe yet.<end>

76934.調理設備がある。\n調理のレシピを 覚えれば\nここで 調理が できそうだ。:
It's a cooking facility.
If you know a cooking recipe, you can cook it
here.

76935.そのカテゴリのレシピは\nまだ 覚えていません。<end>:
You don't know any recipes of this category
yet.<end>

76937.<%sL_RECIPE>を 作るには\n<pc>の 調理職人レベルが\n<%nL:
To create <%sL_RECIPE>, the Cook level of
<pc> must be at least
<%dL_HITUYOU_LV>.<end>

76938.調理とは フライパンにのせた 具材を焼いて\n目的のアイテムを 作ることです。\:
Cooking is the process of baking the ingredients on the fry bread to create the desired item. When the ingredients are cooked,
the doneness meter rises. When the meter is full, the ingredients are ready to eat. All the ingredients should be ready to eat. The
quality of the finished product is determined by this accuracy. Concentration is required to execute the cooking commands. If you lose
concentration, you will not be able to execute the command, so pace yourself and choose the right command. The closer the ingredients are
to the center of the fry bread, the higher the cook meter will go, so adjust the position of the ingredients accordingly. Note that if the
game is interrupted by a communication error while cooking, all ingredients will be lost.

76939.調理の遊び方の説明です！\n<br>\n毎ターン 具材を焼く度に\n各具材の 焼:
This is an explanation of how to play cooking! Each time you cook an ingredient, the meter for that ingredient rises. The meter is
increased each time an ingredient is baked. When the meter is full, the ingredients are ready to eat. When all the ingredients are
ready to eat, use the "finish" command to complete the cooking! However, be careful not to burn the ingredients when the meter becomes
full again. The closer the ingredients are to the center of the fry bread, the more likely they are to rise on the doneness meter. Be
careful to concentrate when you are cooking!

76940.<%sL_RECIPE>を作るには\n素材が 足りません。<end>:
There is not enough material to make
<%sL_RECIPE>.<end>

76941.調理設備がある。\n調理職人であれば\nここで アイテムが作れそうだ。:
It's a cooking facility.
If you're a cook, you can craft items here.

76942.<speed=0><pc>は 調理のとくぎを\nおぼえていない！:
<speed=0><pc> does not remember the cooking
skill!

76944.調理設備がある。\nフライパンがあれば\nここで 調理が できそうだ。:
It's a cooking facility.
If you have a frying pan, you can cook here.

Choose a frying pan to use.
<break>

<speed=0>You can only mix ingredients of the same type
with each other.

76954.<pc>が使っていた\n<%sL_SYOKUNIN_TOOL>は 限界がきて\n:
The <%sL_SYOKUNIN_TOOL> used by <pc>
had reached its limits and was broken...<end>

76956.調理設備がある。\nここで 料理が作れそうだ。\n<break>:
It's a cooking facility.
You can cook here.
<break>

76962.できのよさ<color_yellow>★★★<color_white>の物は で:
Do you want to quick craft this item you have
a knack for? The item will not have a quality
of <color_yellow>★★★<color_white>.<yesno><close>

78788.ダブルたて返しを使うと \n縦横２マスにある 上下の具材を\n入れ替えることがで:
Using Da Bullta Teboshi, you can swap the top
and bottom ingredients in two squares
vertically and horizontally.

78789.ダブルよこ返しを使うと \n縦横２マスにある 左右の具材を\n入れ替えることがで:
The double yoko-yorigami allows you to swap
the left and right ingredients in the two
squares vertically and horizontally.

78791.ななめムーブを使うと\nななめのマスに 具材を移動することができます。:
The diagonal move allows you to move
ingredients to a square diagonally.

78792.弱火焼きを使うと\n全てのマスを ４ターンの間\n半分の火力で 焼くことができま:
With a low-fire burn, all squares can be
burned with half the firepower for four turns.

78793.強火焼きを使うと\n全てのマスを ４ターンの間\n強い火力で 焼くことができます:
With the High Fire Burner, all squares can be
burned with intense heat for four turns.

78794.まぜあわせを使うと\n上下左右にある 同じ種類の具材と\n焼き加減を 揃えること:
The mixer can be used to match the same type of ingredients on the top, bottom, left, and right sides of the pan to the same degree of
doneness.

78795.ねらい焼きを使うと\n選択したマスを 通常より高い会心率で\n焼くことができます:
Aimed burning allows you to burn selected
squares at a higher critical rate than usual.

78796.完熱封じを使ったマスは しばらくの間\n何をしても 焼けなくなります。:
The trout using the perfect heat seal will not
burn no matter what you do for a while.

78797.たて返しを使うと \n縦２マスにある 上下の具材を\n入れ替えることができます。:
Using the flip side, you can swap the top and
bottom ingredients in the two vertical
squares.

78798.トップターンを使うと\n上の列にある具材を 下の列まで\n一気に飛ばすことができ:
The top turn allows the ingredients in the top
row to fly all the way down to the bottom row.

78799.よこ返しを使うと \n横２マスにある 左右の具材を\n入れ替えることができます。:
The "YOKO-TABOROSHI" allows you to swap the
left and right ingredients in the two
horizontal squares.

103198.<color_yellow>\n「どうぐかばん」だけでなく 「預かり所」と\n「:
You can now use materials from your storage and house storage in addition to the items in your item bag for Cooking!
When selecting a recipe with materials you don't have on hand, you have the option of using materials from either storage.

113264.会心焼きを使うと\n高温なマスほど 高い会心率で\n焼くことができます。:
Using the "kaijin-yaki" method, the hotter the
mass is, the higher the critical rate it will
burn.
